rss.channel:
The PGL LobbyCast http://www.pregamelobby.com/forum/lobbycast/ en-us © 2009 PreGameLobby My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-17371d83e7f6df544015687dbb759cd3}
The PGL Lobbycast is a weekly discussion of all things video games, including news and new releases from Xbox 360, Xbox Live Arcade, Xbox Live Indie Games, PS3, PS2, PSP, Nintendo Wii and DS. podcast@pregamelobby.com (PreGameLobby LobbyCast)
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/PGL-Lobbycast200.jpg The PGL LobbyCast http://www.pregamelobby.com/forum/lobbycast/
Lobbycast Episode 162 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam and Geoff talk about the week in news and releases, including Adam Sandler, American Reunion and Hellraiser: The Series. The hosts are proud to welcome Justintime from the chat room for The Weekly Whatchas! Your music this week is "Sweet Child of Mine" by Guns n Roses from the album 'Appetite for Destruction."
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode162.mp3 Tue, 3 Apr 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 163 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Geoff welcomes Zac Smith of Broken Record Films as the special guest host of this fine episode. They bring you the week in news and releases and another edition of The Weekly Whatchas, joined by Elecktromagneto and JSBfan in the Ustream.tv chatroom. The music in the audio program is "(No More) Paddy's Lament by Flogging Molly from the album 'Float.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode163.mp3 Tue, 10 Apr 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 164 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam and Geoff talk Tupac on Tour and the decline of Call of Duty. News and releases are followed by another edition of The Weekly Whatchas. The music on the audio program is "Can't C Me" by Tupac from the album 'All Eyez on Me (Book Two)'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode164.mp3 Tue, 17 Apr 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 165 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam and Geoff talk about the week in releases and news, including Microsoft's patent woes, The Hobbit at 48 fps and the band, Hell's Belles. The music in the audio program is "Hell's Bells" by AC/DC from the album 'AC/DC Live.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode165.mp3 Tue, 24 Apr 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 166 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam, Jordan and Lou take a look at the week in news and releases, including more Riddick, Tron and Stan Lee! Join them for The Weekly Whatchas and post your own in the show notes or on Facebook! The music in the audio program is "Fight with Tools" by The Flobots from the album 'Fight with Tools.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode166.mp3 Tue, 1 May 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 167 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam and Geoff talk about The Avengers and the $99 Xbox 360 before heading into The Weekly Whatchas. The music on the audio program is "Paul Revere" by The Beastie Boys off of 'Ill Communication.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode167.mp3 Tue, 8 May 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 168 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam and Geoff talk Minecraft on 360, Microsoft owing success to Sony and a bit of the old NPD. The music in the audio program is the Walk Off the Earth cover of Gotye's "Someone That I Used to Know."
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode168.mp3 Tue, 15 May 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 169 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Jordan, Sam and Geoff bring you the week in movie and gaming news, with just a dash of tv. Sin City, Bond, Bungie, Aliens and all of this week's releases make an appearance. The music on the audio program is "Matches to Paper Dolls" by Dessa from the album 'A Badly Broken Code.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode169.mp3 Tue, 22 May 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 170 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam, Jordan and Geoff talk about their Top 5 Favorite Movies as well as news and releases. The music in the audio program is The National singing "The Rains of Castamere" from 'The Game of Thrones.'
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode170.mp3 Tue, 29 May 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
Lobbycast Episode 171 podcast@pregamelobby.com (Lou, Sam and Geoff) Sam, Jordan, Lou and Geoff talk about movies, tv, music and games in this week's episode, as well as give an overview of the E3 Press Events put on my Microsoft, Sony and Nintendo. The music on the audio program is "Burning Down the House" by The Talking Heads from the 'The Flashback Four Hits and Rarities' disc.
http://www.pregamelobby.com/podcast/LobbycastEpisode171.mp3 Tue, 5 Jun 2012 02:34:51 GMT podcasts
